techos.title: Drywall Ceilings
techos.shortDesc: Continuous and removable ceiling systems with multiple levels and shapes
techos.fullDesc:
Drywall systems offer the possibility of creating continuous and removable ceilings, allowing the development of multiple levels and shapes to obtain unique ceilings. They can integrate direct lighting elements, sound systems, and ventilation, in addition to being able to incorporate indirect lighting systems to create exclusive and relaxing environments.

Also, if you want to smooth a ceiling to correct leveling deficiencies, we have the solution. For removable ceilings, there is a very wide range of finishes and materials: vinyl, metallic, plaster, fiber, wood...

tabiques.title: Drywall Partitions
tabiques.fullDesc:
Drywall partitions are made up of one or multiple structures of metal profiles made of galvanized steel sheet in various widths, as well as screwed gypsum boards of different types and thicknesses.

The system allows for the incorporation of insulating materials and housing electrical and plumbing installation components, all camouflaged in the internal part of the partition. Additionally, the installation process is quick, clean, and economical.

registrable.title: Removable Ceiling
registrable.fullDesc:
Removable ceilings are a constructive element formed by removable tiles that are fixed to the structure leaving a certain distance through profiles and suspensions. These ceilings have quite broad functionality as they can serve to house installations (cables, pipes...), soundproof spaces, create decorative environments, etc.

This type of ceiling can be found in different materials such as plaster ceilings, metal, wood, vinyl... They also have excellent thermal and acoustic performance as well as high resistance to humidity.

trasdosados.title: Drywall Linings
trasdosados.fullDesc:
Drywall linings are a system where the linings are braced to the interior face of a brick wall. It is formed by a load-bearing metal structure with axis modulation to whose internal side the GYPSUM BOARDS are screwed, with thermal and acoustic insulation core.

This system is recommended for interior wall and facade coverings, for new construction or rehabilitation works where an improvement in thermal and acoustic insulation is obtained.

aislamiento.title: Thermal & Acoustic Insulation
aislamiento.shortDesc: Effective solutions for noise and temperature control
aislamiento.fullDesc:
Noise in housing is a common problem suffered by practically the entire population at some point: dog barking, constant noise from a downpipe, or a neighbor with their sound system... which makes rest difficult, especially at night.

Today, there are countless solutions that offer excellent results, both in materials that work on their own, such as rock or glass wool or others, and in sets formed by two or more materials (Systems) that are previously tested and approved in the laboratory, offering us security in the investment and meeting the expectations of our project.
